Activity: Log in and check emails, review to-do list. Start the day with a positive affirmation.

Focus on creating a compelling player progression system. Design a system for rewarding players with experience points and unlocking new abilities or equipment. I will spend time browsing game design articles and forums for inspiration and new ideas.
Experiment with different progression models. Consider branching skill trees, unlockable weapons, and customizable character builds. Jot down ideas and potential solutions in my notebook.
Implement a basic UI for displaying the player's progress and unlocked abilities. Ensure the UI is clear, intuitive, and visually appealing. For UI issues, I might consult the UX designer.
Lunch break. Prepare a healthy salad for lunch.
Since UI design might need support from UI/UX Designer, send out an email to @Uiux-1 with topic 'Tech support needed on the UI design'. Explain my purpose and request support.
Balance the progression system to ensure a smooth and rewarding experience for the player. Adjust the rate at which players earn experience points and unlock new abilities.

Conduct playtesting sessions to gather feedback on the progression system. Observe how players interact with the system and identify areas for improvement. Analyze feedback and integrate into future changes.
Document the design and implementation of the progression system. Update the to-do list for tomorrow. Relax with a cup of herbal tea before logging off.
